meta_text: ED RIM, BDUD LAS RNAM RGYAL GYI DBANG, 'JIGS BYED LHA BCU GSUM MA BCAS KYI RGYUD 'DEBS, GZHAN YANG BLA BRGYUD 'GA' ZHIG GI GSHAM DU MTHUD RGYU TSIGS BCAD BCAS_Verses for Supplication to the Lamas of the Lineage for a Variety of Subjects— The Teachings on the Steps of the Path, as found in the ‘Great Book on the Steps of the Path to Enlightenment’; The Hundred-Section Supplication to the Lamas of the Lineage of the Instruction on the Profound Path of the Practice of the Lama in the Tradition of Se, along with its Instructions; A Supplication to the Lamas of the Lineage of the Great Seal; the ‘Quartet of Commentaries’; the ‘Total Illumination of the Hid_RVA SGRENG AA CHI THU NO MO HAN BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS (1759-1815)
